entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9 except minus 16 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9 except minus 16 inland. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. Windy. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023
